channel.title: Docs on Prototyping Experimental Textiles
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Prototyping Experimental Textiles

item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: How to Contribute # It is our intention for this book to become a resource that an entire community can contribute towards. Hoping this will be an open source book, forked, edited, and added to by others. If you would like to contribute to the book, visit the GitHub repository for the project at: https://github.com/UnstableDesign/PrototypingSmartTextiles If you are comfortable with GitHub and the command line interface, you can follow these instructions to make changes and submit pull requests to the organizers.
